title: Hour 3 - Cheating in Fishing & Chess
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Cheating in Fishing & Chess
description:
Dan addresses the recent scandals running through the competitive fishing and chess arenas. Fishing insider Matt Markey explains the stakes for fishermen and why they are driven to cheat. And Chess insider Kenneth W. Regan explains exactly how somebody can cheat while playing chess.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
